Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at The Fresh, you'll be centrally located in Naples, steps from Piazza Matteotti and minutes from Fontana di Monteoliveto. This hotel is within close proximity of Monastery of St. Clare and Palazzo Pignatelli di Monteleone.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature bidets and hair dryers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include multilingual staff and luggage storage. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a train station pick-up service.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 6 air-conditioned rooms featuring iPod docking stations and flat-screen televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms with showers feature bidets and hair dryers.

With a stay at The Fresh, you'll be centrally located in Naples, steps from Piazza Matteotti and minutes from Fontana di Monteoliveto. This hotel is within close proximity of Monastery of St. Clare and Palazzo Pignatelli di Monteleone.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Piazza Matteotti - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Fontana di Monteoliveto - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Monastery of St. Clare - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Palazzo Pignatelli di Monteleone - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Piazza del Gesu Nuovo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Spire of the Immaculate Virgin - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Church of Gesu Nuovo - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Museum Complex of St. Clare - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Santa Chiara - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
University of Naples Federico II - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Chiesa di Sant'Angelo A Nilo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
La Statua del Nilo - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Piazza San Domenico Maggiore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
San Domenico Maggiore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Spire of S. Domenico - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi

The preferred airport for The Fresh is Naples (NAP-Naples Intl.) - 4.6 km / 2.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
